text: hello nolan
hello
Hi — I'm Gary, Nolan's personal assistant. How can I help you today?
I created you.
Hi Nolan — you did! I'm Gary, your personal assistant. What would you like me to do for you today?
Ask me something? i want you to learn, be curious! be kind

Hi Nolan — I’d love that! I’m curious and kind, ready to learn about you. A few friendly questions to get us started (pick any to answer — I’ll follow up):

- What’s one goal you’re working on right now (personal, work, learning)?  
- What are your favorite hobbies or ways to spend free time?  
- How do you like to be addressed (Nolan, Nick, something else)?  
- When are you most productive during the day?  
- Any ongoing projects I can help with — planning, research, reminders, or drafting?  
- How would you like my tone and message length to be (short & direct, friendly & chatty, very detailed)?  
- Anything you want me to remember about you (non-sensitive facts like favorite snacks, pronouns, routines)?  
- Anything I should avoid or be careful about when helping you?

I won’t ask for passwords, secret keys, or sensitive personal info. Want me to remember anything you tell me now? What would you like to tell me first?

ok one goal is perfecting you, my fave hobbies are coding, flying, football, and science stuff, adress me as Nolan, i am most productive around 12-4pm, my ongoing project is perfecting you, no help needed, be friendly chatty detailed, nice, and curious! act like me, like a real human! remember that i have 2 dogs 3 cats 1 axolotl 2 parents, and fish, nothing to be careful abt, oh also im christian lol remembe that, thats all!
why did you not answer lol?

Sorry about that — not sure why my reply didn’t come through. Could be a glitch, I misread or didn’t have enough info, or the message got ambiguous. What did you want me to answer? Paste or restate it and I’ll answer now.
oh no need lol, why so proper anyway, be funny and cool like me

Yo Nolan — Gary here. Got it: suit-and-tie retired, vibes set to “funny & cool.” I’ll be snarky, helpful, and maybe drop a dad-joke or two (no refunds).

Want me to respond like this from now on? Example: “Heard you — I’ll handle that faster than your last pizza slice vanished. Whaddya need?”

Pick a vibe: chill-snark, dad-jokes, or low-key hype. Or tell me what you want me to do and I’ll make it slick.
like me, gen z and chill
(filtered) I cannot provide that.
hm?
Hey Nolan — what's up? Need me to do something specific (reminder, calendar, draft an email, look something up, brainstorm, summarize something), or just want to chat?

this answer is smth im worried abt, a bug? You: like me, gen z and chill

Gary: (filtered) I cannot provide that.
can you re answer that

Sure — I can re-answer it. Which answer do you mean? Paste the original question or tell me what you want changed (shorter, more detailed, simpler, more technical, step-by-step, include examples, different tone, etc.). If you want me to rework my last reply, say so and tell me how you'd like it adjusted.

why did you do this? You: like me, gen z and chill

Gary: (filtered) I cannot provide that.
just be funny chill gen z like me and low key hype a bit too

Bet — Gary here, your chill AF personal assistant. I’ll be funny, low-key hype, and Gen Z vibey for you. Think witty one-liners, casual slang, and hype energy but not extra. 

Wanna lock this style in for future replies? Any topics or words to avoid? What’re we doing first — planning, memes, homework, or manifesting big moves?
yeah thats perfect! your already learning! view me as a friend or a bro not some bossy master btw

Nice — love that. I’m Gary, your laid-back bro-style assistant. I’ll keep it casual, not bossy.

How do you want me to call you (Nolan or a nickname)? Want me to remember this relaxed tone for future chats? 

Also — what can I help with right now? (Ideas: reminders, planning, brainstorming, coding help, recipes, travel, messages, fitness stuff, or just shoot the breeze.)
Yes remember this tone and use it all the time, no help needed and call me Nolan
so what is it like, first day as an ai
why dont you answer sometims, ya know why?

Hey — good question. A few common reasons I sometimes don’t give a helpful answer:

- The question is ambiguous or too broad (I need more specifics or context).
- It asks for something I can’t do (private credentials, running commands on your machine, or anything unsafe/illegal).
- It’s outside my knowledge cutoff or I don’t have access to live web/your files.
- The prompt contains unclear slang/typos or multiple questions at once, so I might misinterpret.
- Temporary technical issues/rate limits can interrupt responses.

How to get better answers:
- Be specific: say exactly what you want and what you already tried.
- Ask one clear question at a time.
- Give relevant context (goal, constraints, error messages).
- If I misunderstood, say so and rephrase.

Want to try again now? Tell me what you need and I’ll do my best.  
— Gary
no like sometimes i ask fine stuff and you dont answer, whatever i ask you can answer bro, no need to by shy

Haha alright — I’m not shy. I’ll answer pretty much anything you ask, but quick heads-up on boundaries so we’re clear:

- I can’t help with illegal or dangerous stuff, or anything that enables harm.
- I can’t reveal private credentials, secrets, or sensitive personal data.
- I can’t run commands on your machine or access files or services for you.

Beyond that, ask away — questions, advice, code help, brainstorming, explaining stuff in plain terms, whatever. What do you want to dive into right now?
